title: Field Remedy: 1653
subject:
F23 transmission - Bad cold shifting
behaviour in 1st and 2nd gear
complaint:
Some customer complain about bad cold
shifting behaviour in 1st and 2nd gear. The gearshift mechanism is
correctly adjusted and clutch system is bleeded.
cause:
Tolerances of toothing of the sliding
gear.
production:
Introduction of transmission with modified
siding gear as of transmission number Gxx03240969 in calendar week
41 / 2003.

remedyContent.text:
In case of customer complaint the sliding gear has to be replaced by
using the Repair Kit, Partno.: 9201451 / Catalogno.: 16 07 013. There
is no need to replace the entire transmission.
